definitions.text: specify as a condition or requirement in a contract or agreement; make an express demand or provision in an agreement
examples: The will stipulates that she can live in the house for the rest of her life
The contract stipulates the dates of the payments
Could you please specify your criticism of my paper?
I cannot narrow down the rules for this game
She was intended to become the director

definitions.text: select something or someone for a specific purpose
examples: The teacher assigned him to lead his classmates in the exercise
